text: Amy Gutmann (born 1949) is an American political scientist, academic and politician. She was the United States Ambassador to Germany from 2022 to 2024. She was the eighth president of the University of Pennsylvania from 2004 until 2022. On July 2, 2021, President Joe Biden nominated her to serve as the United States Ambassador to Germany. On February 8, 2022, the United States Senate confirmed her nomination by a 54-42 vote. Gutmann resigned in July 2024. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Academics from Pennsylvania Category:American political scientists Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Germany Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Princeton University faculty
title: Amy Gutmann
